title: The Antiquary - Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: "You must know," he said, "our Scottish antiquarieshave been greatly divided about the local situation of the finalconflict between Agricola and the Caledonians; some contend for Ardochin Strathallan, some for Innerpeffry, some for the Raedykes in theMearns, and some are for carrying the scene of action as far north asBlair in Athole.

title: The Antiquary - Volume 01
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: "You must know," he said, "our Scottish antiquarieshave been greatly divided about the local situation of the finalconflict between Agricola and the Caledonians; some contend for Ardochin Strathallan, some for Innerpeffry, some for the Raedykes in theMearns, and some are for carrying the scene of action as far north asBlair in Athole.

title: The antiquary
author: Scott, Walter, Sir
snippet: and the Caledonians - some contend for Ardoch in Strath- allan, some for Innerpeffrey, some for the Raedykes in the Mearns, and some are for carrying the scene of action as far north as Blair in Athole.
